com.kuka.roboticsAPI.controllerModel.sunrise

Class SunriseSafetyStateProvider<T extends ISafetyState>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kuka.roboticsAPI.controllerModel.sunrise.SunriseSafetyStateProvider<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the safety state
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISafetyStateProvider<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SunriseControllerSafety, SunriseDeviceSafety

    public abstract class SunriseSafetyStateProvider<T extends ISafetyState>
extends Object
implements ISafetyStateProvider<T>
    This class provides a cached safety state.

    Initially the state is requested from Sunrise and updated by events.
